abstract: Abdulkarim al-Khaiwani, dissident journalist and supporter of rebel Houthis, is shot and killed by unidentified gunman in Sana, Yemen.
lead_paragraph: Abdulkarim al-Khaiwani, who wrote about the Houthi rebellion and survived beatings and prison under the former government, was killed outside his home in Sana.

headline.main: Dissident Journalist in Yemen Is Shot and Killed
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: Dissident Journalist Killed

snippet: Abdulkarim al-Khaiwani, who wrote about the Houthi rebellion and survived beatings and prison under the former government, was killed outside his home in Sana.
